p.seg: Would it not be better to use Gentlemen, with a note saying that the letter to individual officers would most likely have been headed "Sir"

div.p: I have the honor to request that you will be so good as to furnish not later than the 15th instant the Honorable Commissioner of Public Works with an estimate of your probable requirements for public works during the year 1876-7. A copy of such estimate should also be transmitted to this office.
